element.name: rpBody
element.sql: SELECT at.name acType, ac.name acName, tc.nominal, acs.date_from, acs.date_to FROM ukmserver.trm_in_account_type_certificates tc INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_account_type at ON tc.id = at.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.local_auth_account ac ON ac.account_type_id = at.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.local_auth_certificate_account acs ON ac.id = acs.account_id WHERE acs.date_to BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(:pFrom, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(:pTo, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ukmserver.local_auth_account_journal aj WHERE ac.id = aj.account_id AND aj.amount < 0)
